_header: An hart if he chased he will desire to a river
_description: On a hart crossing a river or stream as it flees the hunter — varying number of lines, in strings of roughly monorhyming short lines

YaleBei163.Transcription:
An herte if he Chased he woll desyre to a reweralso soone as he
                    takyththe Rever he soylethif he take thritte over the Rever he
                    crossethif he returne he recrossethIf he take with the streme he
                    fletythIf he take ayenste the streme he betythor brekyth yf he take
                    the lond be fleyth
